name: Rohan

projects.title: HiTech Task App
projects.description: A React Native app made for HiTechRO that tracks tasks and provides a detail overview on company's projects.

projects.title: A Blockchain Based Mobile Anti-Theft Solution
projects.description: A smart contract that uses IMEI numbers that allows owners to block the phone once stolen. Made using Solidity and React

projects.title: React Chat App
projects.description: A minimal React Chat App made using React, Express and SocketIO

projects.title: Age Invariant Facial Recognition System
projects.description: A Computer Vision model to detect faces of people from given database regardless of their age. Built using Akaze, SURF and ORB as feature extractors. Calculating accuracy using FRR and FAR

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: React JS, Redux, Next JS, Chart JS, Bootstrap

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Node JS, Mongo DB, Google Sheet API, Postman

services.title: Other Dev Skills
services.description: React Native, Solidity, Unity and always ready to learn new skills :)

aboutpara: Hi I am Rohan, a software developer currently building Scream, a SaaS for Content Creators. I am currently pursuing a Bachelors in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering from BITS Pilani. With a strong background in programming and a passion for technology, I am eager to apply my skills and continue learning in a professional setting.
